definition: Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: What kind of Gundam story are you aiming for?
sentences.chinese: 你想做一個什麼樣的高達故事？

sentences.english: Some investors even raked in up to 40 percent in profits.
sentences.chinese: 一些投資者甚至迅速賺得高達40%的利潤。

sentences.english: This allows you to borrow up to 25% more than its appraised value.
sentences.chinese: 這讓你借取高達25%以上的鑑定價值。

sentences.english: As a result, a fuel-saving potential of up to eight per cent is possible.
sentences.chinese: 因此，節油潛力高達百分之八，是可能的。

sentences.english: That puts the stock on a still-heady multiple of 23 times earnings.
sentences.chinese: 以這一股價折算的雅虎預期市盈率仍然高達23倍。

sentences.english: Some drivers charge as much as ten times the legal fare .
sentences.chinese: 有些司機索取的車資高達原法定車資的十倍。

sentences.english: The average city-dwelling American sees up to 5, 000 advertisements a day.
sentences.chinese: 美國城市居民平均每天看到得廣告高達5000條。

sentences.english: A girl up to four of the rubber band is also gently over.
sentences.chinese: 一個女生高達四級的皮筋也輕輕越過。

sentences.english: In North America it's something like two-thirds to three-quarters.'
sentences.chinese: 在北美，因此消亡的物種高達三分之二至四分之三。

sentences.english: Lofty figs are tall evergreen trees, reaching 35 metres in height.
sentences.chinese: 高山榕樹爲高大常綠喬木，可高達35米。

sentences.english: Using back seat belts reduce casualties in fatal accidents up to 75%.
sentences.chinese: 使用安全帶可以減少高達75%事故傷亡率。

sentences.english: Furthermore, brown bear populations have dropped as much as 50 percent in the last 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 此外，過去15年中，棕熊種羣數量下降高達50%。

sentences.english: Some informed estimates place Iraqi civilian casualities at over 600,000.
sentences.chinese: 有些知情者估計伊拉克死亡市民人數高達60萬以上。

sentences.english: These came in four metre lengths, each having a diameter of one meter.
sentences.chinese: 它們運過來的時候高達四米，每根直徑都有一米。

sentences.english: up to 60% of outpatient health clinic visits.
sentences.chinese: 高達衛生診所門診病人的60%。

sentences.english: The fish can stay out of water for up to three days.
sentences.chinese: 這種魚可以在水外存活高達三天之久。

definition: up to/no less than/as much as
to add up the total/to figure what sth amounts to/to consider
